column5: We are heading to LOTW on the 3rd of June and does anyone know of any changes on fishing regulations this year?
A friend of mine had fished LOW for over 20 years, house boat style! The rules and regs, took all of the fun out of the trip. He has "retired" from Canada, but still fishes south of the border!
http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/stdprodcons...nr_e001325.pdfI don't see anything new, but I would read it if you aren't sure.
